title: Is there a way to opt out of end of season rewards?
body: I'm currently gold, but i really really don't want victorious maokai. Can i opt out of receiving him? please someone from rito reply. the LAST thing i want to do is demote so that i wont get him, since it will be terrible for my teamates in those games. if i could opt out of receiving him it would be great, but at the very least could you de-rank my profile to silver so that i don't have to do it myself and ruin someone else ranked games. i know this is a very wierd request, but not owning champs i hate is very important to me.

replies.body: Once the season ends and rewards are sent out, we can look into this for you.  Reach out to us through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) after rewards are received, and we'll see what we can do.  Hope that helps!
Ok, thank you very much! will do. what do i file the ticket under?
General is fine, question about League of Legends.  You'll be in good hands either way!

ok thank you very much again for taking the time to reply. i know this is a really odd request, but it is important to me. 
http://www.lovethisgif.com/uploaded_images/39404-Winter-Translations-W-Group-Groups-Batoto-Read-Comics-Online-....gif

Can I have his?
       Thanks, 
                    A B5 player ;)
can I just ask why? its not like you have to ever use the skin

for me it's maokai himself. i only own champs that i like on my account and really want to keep it that way. i have 0ver 70,000 IP and would have over 200,000 IP if i dindn't spend it on a bunch of random crap like 4 rune pages and runes, chroma skins, bundles and icons. i know it's a bit odd, but it's just something i decided a long time ago.
